name: LitMan Thrall Placing Distance
description:
[quote]Latest Update. Dev Kit Version 634425.39906.[/quote]

[b]Thralls can be placed closer to each other.[/b]

Default value in Vanilla Game is 500.000000. Default value in Mod is 100.000000. Mod overrides ServerSetting.ini value.

Admins could change the value in range 50-1000 with console command.

[code]DataCmd SetTPD 100[/code]

To open console press ~ (Tilde) on your keyboard.

Support Channel on Discord: https://discord.gg/QQUm3mS

I released all my Source files on Gitlab https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods if anyone wants to keep updated those Mods or release own ones.

If you would like to Donate feel free to do so on Paypal https://www.paypal.me/kasperaitis

Mod ID: 884168480
Test Live ID: 2894247178
changeNote:
Dev Kit Version 634425.39906

Updated to match the live game version.
author: LitMan
